product_name: Burton TWC Tracker Insulated Jacket - Men's
long_description: In any winter weather, the waterproof Burton TWC Tracker insulated jacket delivers solid protection and great comfort for long days spent carving turns on the slopes. DRYRIDE Durashell(TM) 2-layer coated nylon shell with critically taped seams provides windproof, waterproof and breathable protection from the elements. 60g Thermacore(TM) insulation in the body and 40g in the sleeves and hood is placed strategically to retain warmth and keep you comfortable on cold days. Open up the mesh-lined pit zippers to vent body heat quickly. Flip up the hood to keep wind and swirling snow out. Waist gaiter with jacket-to-pants interface creates a barrier against snow entry with compatible Burton pants (sold separately). Includes zippered hand pockets, a zippered chest pocket, sleeve pocket and internal goggles/sound pocket. The Burton TWC Tracker jacket is built for layering without being overly baggy; sleeves are designed with a bit of extra length to fit over your gloves and keep snow out.
short_description: In any winter weather, the waterproof Burton TWC Tracker insulated jacket delivers solid protection and great comfort for long days spent carving turns on the slopes.
